16.1
boy names vowels
BabyNames %>%
  filter(sex=="M") %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(total= sum(count)) %>%
  filter(grep1("[aeiou]$",name)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total)) %>%
  head(10)
  
names jo joe
BabyNames %>%
  group_by(name) %>%
  summarise(total=sum(count)) %>%
  filter(grep1(".*(jo$|joe$)",name)) %>%
  arrange(desc(total)) %>%
  head(10)
